Name: Super Impossible Road
About the game: In the future, you’ve got to play a little dirty if you want to win races. Master hairpin turns across dangerous courses that twist and coil over beautiful galactic backdrops, knocking opponents into the void of space. Kick into hyperdrive with temporary speed boosts and use every opportunity to jump off the paths of the rollercoaster-like tracks. Bypass gates and checkpoints and roll over competitors on the way to first place! The spiritual sequel to the award-winning Impossible Road is back and more ferocious than ever with all-new modes, 120 FPS local multiplayer, insane online play, and much more! So what’re you waiting for? Crack those knuckles and jump into the fastest, craziest, most spectacular racer you've ever played. GAME FEATURES: Race with your friends online no matter what console they have! Online cross-play is now available for Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PlayStation, and Apple Arcade. Race online with up to 8 players at once Race on a single PC with 4-player split-screen Career mode Single player modes with leaderboards A new track globally every day in Daily Track mode Full vehicle customization for boosting stats Physically modeled material system with volumetric lighting and realtime reflections Full surround sound system support Procedural generation creates a new track every time Techno soundtrack
